title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) is not being rejected correctly when stored in the report design.
OB: When an invalid date/time string is entered in the report design, the system does not reject it and allows it to be stored.
EB: The system should validate the date value either through the user interface (UI) or the model, and reject any invalid date/time strings.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the report design page. 2. Enter an invalid date/time string in one of the date fields. 3. Save the report design.
